Initializer# init(device:quantizationDescriptor:)

iOS 18.0+iPadOS 18.0+Mac Catalyst 18.0+macOS 15.0+tvOS 18.0+visionOS 2.0+

```
init(
    device: any MTLDevice,
    quantizationDescriptor: MPSNDArrayAffineQuantizationDescriptor
)
```
